titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress concerning the International Year of the World's Indigenous Peoples.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Security, International Organizations and Human Rights.
Referred to the Subcommittee On Insular and International Affairs.

committee.name: House Foreign Affairs
committee.subcommittee: International Security, International Organizations, and Human Rights

bill.summary: 10/14/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress with respect to indigenous peoples in the United States and throughout the world and the International Year of the World's Indigenous Peoples.
